mapper.select: SELECT re.* FROM sh_resource re LEFT JOIN sh_role_resource rr ON rr.RESOURCE_ID = re.ID LEFT JOIN sh_role ro ON rr.ROLE_ID = ro.ID LEFT JOIN sh_user_role ur ON ur.ROLE_ID = ro.ID LEFT JOIN sh_user u ON u.ID = ur.USER_ID WHERE rr.ENABLE_FLAG = 'aaa' AND re.ENABLE_FLAG = 'aaa' AND ro.ENABLE_FLAG = 'YES' AND ur.ENABLE_FLAG = 'YES' AND u.ENABLE_FLAG = 'YES' AND u.ID = #{userId}
